sub_title: Vice President Real Estate Strategy & Portfolio
summary:
Transformational leader with extensive experience in Strategic, Commerical, Capital investments and Operational leadership. An exceptional track record across multiple Shell Businesses & Geographies of delivering exceptional business outcomes in some of the most challenging environments. A strong visible leader, committed to mentoring and developing talent with a passion for building a Performance- driven, diverse and inclusive culture. A senior Corporate Leader who has served on multiple Boards and led a Public Listed Company. Currently as Vice President Shell Real Estate Strategy & Portfolio, based out of Netherlands since July 2018 and having worked with the Shell Group since December 1997.  

Strategic Leadership
Has driven numerous Strategic Transformational Programs, setting a strong vision with stretch goals and targets, whilst maintaining a clear focus on skilful integration and Continuous Improvement principles. Possesses high level of emotional intelligence and leadership credibility to bring others on the journey, demonstrating the right balance between risk tolerance and mitigation, and the ambition to achieve a stretch agenda. Structured approach to developing strategic solutions to complex business problems. 

Business Partnering
Demonstrated outstanding Business Partnering skills, building collaborative trusted relationships and networks with both internal (senior leadership teams in Royal Dutch Shell including Downstream Leadership team & Executive Committee engagements) and external stakeholders (governments, diplomats, media, business JV partners, suppliers and industry). Possess strong personal gravitas required to deal effectively with conflicting priorities and challenges to deliver operational excellence and the right outcomes.

Commercial Mindset
Notable commercial acumen delivering integrated value in both business & functional roles. Demonstrates ability to expertly frame up opportunities and instil business principles and commercial mindset in his teams to deliver exceptional results, delivered cost savings opportunities in excess of $300mn across the Global Real Estate portfolio by consolidation and contract management. 

External focus 
Maintains and develops external relationships to capture best practice and drive organizational agenda to stay ahead of the curve by demonstrating reduction in unit costs and enhancing productivity that positively impacts share price.

contributors.headline: Vice President Real Estate Strategy & Portfolio

profile_positions.description:
VP Real Estate Strategy & Portfolio is a Global role within Shell Real Estate team and owns and drives the Groups Real Estate strategy. The role drives strategy development, implementation and management of Shell Group Real Estate strategy and portfolio planning in an affordable, competitive and credible manner. 

Leading the Global Capital Development Project Management Ofice (PMO) for roughly $275mn annual capital expenditure and ensuring strong capital discipline across the Global portfolio via robust planning and structured implementation

Accountable for the design standards and frameworks to deliver Employee & Visitor Experience by delivering Shell Brand Identity and Experience in ‘moments that matter’.   

Works with Senior Business Leaders to deliver Shell overall real estate strategy, growths and divestment plans and how Real Estate enables for better business outcomes. 

Responsible for M&A activities and working with non-operated ventures where relevant. 

Provides thought leadership, drives commercial acumen and stimulates innovation in Real Estate strategy, Leads the development and management of Group Real Estate strategy and portfolio plans globally. 

Driving strategic transformational change that will enable delivery of Real Estate Net Zero Emissions 


Integrating RE capability across Shell and JVs and to ensure value capture through non-operated Joint Ventures.
profile_positions.title: Vice President Real Estate Strategy & Portfolio

profile_positions.description:
CEO and MD Shell Group of Companies in Pakistan with a turnover of US$ 3.0 Bn+. Leading businesses across Mid and Downstream in Pakistan

Successfully engaged Media, Financial Investors and represented Shell on a number of external Boards to enhance Shell’s reputation in Pakistan. 

A strong visible Leader in Health Safety Security & Environment, Ethics & Compliance, Code of Conduct and Business Principles.
profile_positions.title: CEO and Managing Director / VP SBO (Double hatting)

profile_positions.description:
•	Custodian of the Shell Group strategy on shared/off-shored business operations that is delivered through a network of 6 Business Service Centres across the world (Manila, KL, Chennai, Krakow, Glasgow and Cape Town). 

•	Leading the Shell Group strategy on off shored business operations and shared services and to lead the planning, implementation and subsequent operation of the common infrastructure and services of Shell's shared service centres around the world. 

•	Working closely with Business and Functional leaders in developing future strategies that optimize the value of the network and identify and deliver additional sources of value to Shell, particularly in the area of end-to-end process management.

•	Managing operations at the 6 locations through and responsible for all the common infrastructure, facilities and general affairs at these centres.

Accountable for an annual budget to run and maintain business operations

Staff: Direct 8 (6 General Managers of service centres; 1 Strategy and Planning General Manager, 4 indirect members of the Business Service Center Functional Leadership Team that include representatives from HR, IT, Finance and Real Estate – and 190 BSC staff in the shared service centres
profile_positions.title: Vice President Shell Business Operations

profile_positions.description:
• Global key account lead for all ‘Retail’ and ‘Global Commercial (B2B)’ internal consultancy needs, helping businesses to proactively develop strategic projects/plans and help deliver downstream growth & maintain agenda 

• Supporting development for operating units Capital development and growth plans strategies  

• Managed and delivered number of ‘integrated downstream business reviews’ 

• Business Growth and Turnaround projects – fix or exit 

• Manage a portfolio of strategic, high value, most confidential and operational projects across other downstream businesses 
- Managed and delivered number of ‘integrated downstream business reviews’ in China, Turkey, Pakistan, India, Philippines, Japan, Indonesia, Singapore, Europe, NA and Canada
- Delivered strategic growth strategies for the Lubricants business in Europe, Russia, China, Indonesia and India
- Delivered supply chain optimisation projects for Thailand, Philippines, Pakistan, India and China
- Delivered new business development projects within the value chain for US, China, India and Indonesia
- Developing strategic supply chain options for Shell to meet growth needs by 2020 and 2025 – e.g. helping framing possible JV options and long term supply contracts for Base oil demand in the East
- Managing JV relationships in Showa Shell Japan as key lead from Shell to negotiate support needed and how can the JV deliver higher value for the shareholders (Shell does not have operational control in Japan) (one off project)
- Work closely with senior Downstream leadership in helping them shape the Downstream agenda through framing and delivery of high impact projects

• Leading a team of 12 consultants in Singapore & Europe and working on projects through consultants that are globally based
profile_positions.title: Downstream Management Consultancy Manager (Strategy & Consultancy)

profile_positions.description:
Global team lead ‘Centre of excellence’ custodian of the ‘policy’ for on-site operational excellence and team lead for 'Shell Brand/Visual Identity' ‘standards’ and its various ‘site manifestations’ across the retail business

Globally accountable for the Brand representation – formats – visual identity – customer experience for the retail business (on retail sites) across all platforms  

Developed and manage Global initiatives, activities and standards to ensure consistent, friendly, hassle-free experience at retail sites – define site formats, definitions for upgrades to existing formats, technology inclusions, payment acceptance systems and on-site communications standards and policies

Developed and managed Global initiatives, activities and standards to ensure consistent, friendly, hassle-free experience at retail sites – defined site formats, definitions for upgrades to existing formats, technology inclusions, payment acceptance systems and on-site communications standards and policies 

Global team lead ‘Centre of excellence’ custodian sales teams operations excellence. Team lead for inspiring and driving retail organization towards the vision of on-site operational excellence 

Delivered Global retail service strategy to exceed customer expectations and provide support to local markets in the adaptation and execution of service initiatives to drive business performance.
profile_positions.title: Global Customer Experience Manager - Operations Excellence

profile_positions.description:
Board Member Shell Indonesia with P&L accountability 
Lead new market entry strategy for Shell in Indonesia delivering  Shell’s  first outlet in 10 months, thereby making Shell the first international oil company to enter Indonesia
Engaged actively in negotiating and helping regulatory authorities in defining the downstream road map
Maintained relationships with key government stakeholders e.g. regulatory authorities, petroleum associations, oil and gas ministry etc.
Engaged on a strategic level interfacing  with  the national oil company on potential Joint Ventures / commercial cooperation to deliver aspired growth agenda
Media and designated Public relation spokesperson for Shell Indonesia on retail matters
The business outlook plans included to deliver increased capital spending in a new market entry 
Managed implementation of an ERP system (SAP), to deliver standardisation and alignment with the Shell Group
Delivered the growth agenda in a new entry – by managing site acquisition, master planning, land negotiations, construction, tender evaluation, government permits, compliance to environmental and construction standards, bill of quantity and capex spending and later started to build a team to support continuity of business – this I must say was one of the most complex and difficult jobs in my career
I delivered the 1st site in just 10 months of moving to Jakarta – this was Shell’s first site in Indonesia in over 40 years and Shell became the first international oil company to enter this market
Negotiated number of high value deals with complex stakeholders such as regulatory authorities, business corporations, property tycoons, high profile individuals etc.
profile_positions.title: General Manager New Market Entry (Retail Indonesia)

profile_positions.description:
I managed annual capital investment (growth projects) for the cluster (PK, OM, TH, LA and CA) – managing a team virtually in a regional organisation
Delivering growth projects and at the same time managing challenging markets with ‘milk’ and ‘exit’ strategy and provided technical support to the Indian new market entry
profile_positions.title: Cluster Network Manager (PK, TH, OM, LA & CA)

profile_positions.description:
Delivered lubricants marketing plans for retail business
I managed the P&L of a business that contributed 32% to the overall profitability - implemented key initiatives (non-traditional) resulting in 37% increase in gross margins and increase in market share from 29% to 34%
Negotiated & Implemented Strategic Alliances with Business partners (Original Engine Manufacturers & Commercial Banks)
profile_positions.title: Category Manager Retail Lubricants

profile_positions.description:
I represented the retail organization and all supporting functions such as product supply, distribution, finance, HSSE, storage, procurement, external & corporate affairs 
I was accountable for centrally managing Company operated sites in Pakistan
Helping the sales and operations organisation to deliver operations excellence initiatives
profile_positions.title: Retail Operations Support Manager (Sales & Operations)

profile_positions.description:
Worked in the retail sector managing sales territories as Territory Manager and District Manager
Responsible for 15% of the national volume and 14% of the national profitability as District Manager
The role involved  managing franchises, interfacing with local regulatory stakeholders, fleet customers/distributors/shop suppliers etc
profile_positions.title: Regional & Territory Sales Manager

profile_positions.description:
Managed start-up and independent textile manufacturing business for 4 years
Currently maintain the business unit on a profit and loss sharing with a local partner
